Package main.database

Class Database<ModelObject extends Model>

java.lang.Object
main.utils.iocontrol.Preservable<ModelObject>
main.database.Database<ModelObject>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<ModelObject>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CampDatabase, EnquiryDatabase, StaffDatabase, StudentDatabase, SuggestionDatabase
public abstract class Database<ModelObject extends Model> extends Preservable<ModelObject> implements Iterable<ModelObject>

    • findByRules

      @SafeVarargs public final List<ModelObject> findByRules(Database.RepositoryRule<ModelObject>... rules)
      Finds all model objects in the database that match the specified rules. Multiple rules can be specified, and all rules must be satisfied for a model object to be considered a match. The rules are specified as lambda expressions that take a model object as a parameter and return a boolean.
      Parameters:
      rules - the rules to match
      Returns:
      a list of all model objects in the database that match the specified rules

    • getList

      public List<ModelObject> getList()
      Gets a list of all model objects in the database.
      Returns:
      a list of all model objects in the database
